nodes.text: Captain Kamer Suu was a defector from the Galactic Empire before or during 1 BBY Suu spoke about the development of the Incinerator war droid, and the conversation was recorded in the Collected Interviews of Captain Kamer Suu, Defector from the Empire.

Kamer Suu was first mentioned in the "Incinerator war droid" entry in the in-game databank of the PlayStation 3/Xbox 360 versions of LucasArts' video game Star Wars: The Force Unleashed II, released in 2010.
